title: This summer, Taiwanese barista Xie Yi-chen won the 2024 World Coffee Championships...
content:
This summer, Taiwanese barista Xie Yi-chen won the 2024 World Coffee Championships with patterns of a whale, a moose, and a dragon. ‚ÄúTo prepare for the competition, Xie practiced latte art on around 10,000 cups in just three months.‚Äù
